metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart is angry at the player for harming  her parent(s).
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the grotto.without an avatar2. Kill Shadowheart's parents before her

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: What have you done?! As soon as I get back to camp, you and I are finished.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: They were my sacrifice to make. This will not stand - expect to answer for it at camp.
